rules.title: RULE APPLICATION AND OTHER CONDITIONS
rules.text:
NOTE - THE FOLLOWING TEXT IS INFORMATIONAL AND NOT
VALIDATED FOR AUTOPRICING.
LOTUSMILE FARES FOR REDEMPTION
APPLICATION
CLASS OF SERVICE
THESE FARES APPLY FOR BUSINESS/ECONOMY CLASS
SERVICE.
TYPES OF TRANSPORTATION
FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE CAN BE USED TO CREATE
ONE-WAY/ROUND-TRIP/CIRCLE-TRIP/OPEN-JAW/SINGLE
OPEN-JAW/DOUBLE OPEN-JAW JOURNEYS.
CAPACITY LIMITATIONS
THE CARRIER SHALL LIMIT THE NUMBER OF PASSENGERS
CARRIED ON ANY ONE FLIGHT AT FARES GOVERNED BY
THIS RULE AND SUCH FARES WILL NOT NECESSARILY BE
AVAILABLE ON ALL FLIGHTS. THE NUMBER OF SEATS,
WHICH THE CARRIER SHALL MAKE AVAILABLE ON A GIVEN
FLIGHT, WILL BE DETERMINED BY THE CARRIER$S BEST
JUDGEMENT.

rules.title: ELIGIBILITY
rules.text:
NOTE - TEXT BELOW NOT VALIDATED FOR AUTOPRICING.
APPLY TO LOTUSMILES MEMBERS AND LOTUSMILES
MEMBERS NOMINEE FOR REDEMPTION

rules.title: SEASONALITY
rules.text:
ORIGINATING SGN OUTBOUND -
PERMITTED 01JAN17 THROUGH 12JAN17 OR 01FEB17 THROUGH
31JAN18 OR 19FEB18 THROUGH 31DEC18
ORIGINATING SGN INBOUND -
OR 01JAN17 THROUGH 29JAN17 OR 13FEB17 THROUGH
17FEB18 OR 26FEB18 THROUGH 31DEC18 FOR EACH TRIP.
SEASON IS BASED ON TRIP DATE.
ORIGINATING HAN OUTBOUND -
PERMITTED 01JAN17 THROUGH 29JAN17 OR 13FEB17 THROUGH
17FEB18 OR 26FEB18 THROUGH 31DEC18
ORIGINATING HAN INBOUND -
OR 01JAN17 THROUGH 12JAN17 OR 01FEB17 THROUGH
31JAN18 OR 19FEB18 THROUGH 31DEC18 FOR EACH TRIP.
SEASON IS BASED ON TRIP DATE.

rules.title: FLIGHT APPLICATION
rules.text:
THE FARE COMPONENT MUST BE ON
ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
VN FLIGHTS 1 THROUGH 2999
VN FLIGHTS 5000 THROUGH 7999
VN FLIGHTS 9000 THROUGH 9999.

rules.title: ADVANCE RESERVATIONS/TICKETING
rules.text:
CONFIRMED RESERVATIONS ARE REQUIRED FOR ALL SECTORS.
NOTE - TEXT BELOW NOT VALIDATED FOR AUTOPRICING.
OPEN SEGMENT NOT PERMITTED.
VN SECTORS - GO-SHOW NOT PERMITTED IN HIGH SEASON.

rules.title: STOPOVERS
rules.text: STOPOVERS ARE NOT PERMITTED AT INTERMEDIATE POINTS.

rules.title: TRANSFERS
rules.text:
UNLIMITED TRANSFERS PERMITTED. - SURFACE AT FARE BREAK
AND EMBEDDED SECTORS PERMITTED EXCEPT FOR PRICING UNITS
WITHIN/BETWEEN US AND CANADA - INCLUDING PR/USV1 -
SURFACE AT FARE BREAK IS NOT PERMITTED.

rules.title: COMBINATIONS
rules.text:
END-ON-END
END-ON-END COMBINATIONS PERMITTED. VALIDATE ALL FARE
COMPONENTS. SIDE TRIPS PERMITTED WITH NO
RESTRICTIONS. TRAVEL MUST BE VIA THE POINT OF
COMBINATION.
PROVIDED -
COMBINATIONS ARE WITH ANY CSM-/YSM- TYPE FARES FOR
CARRIER VN IN THIS RULE AND TARIFF.
OPEN JAWS
FARES MAY BE COMBINED ON A HALF ROUND TRIP BASIS
WITH VN FARES
-TO FORM SINGLE OR DOUBLE OPEN JAWS WHICH CONSISTS
OF NO MORE THAN 2 INTERNATIONAL FARE COMPONENTS AND
THE OPEN SEGMENT AT ORIGIN MUST BE IN ONE COUNTRY.
THE OPEN SEGMENT AT DESTINATION HAS NO RESTRICTIONS
A MAXIMUM OF TWO INTERNATIONAL FARE COMPONENTS
PERMITTED. MILEAGE OF THE INTERNATIONAL OPEN SEGMENT
MUST BE EQUAL/LESS THAN MILEAGE OF THE SHORTEST
FLOWN FARE COMPONENT. THERE IS NO MILEAGE
RESTRICTION ON AN OPEN SEGMENT WITHIN ONE COUNTRY.
PROVIDED -
WHEN THE OPEN SEGMENT OCCURS
-WITHIN NORTH AMERICA/WITHIN CENTRAL AMERICA/
WITHIN SOUTH AMERICA/WITHIN INTERNATIONAL POINTS
IN THE CARIBBEAN AREA/WITHIN EUROPE/WITHIN MIDDLE
EAST/WITHIN AFRICA/WITHIN SOUTHEAST ASIA/WITHIN
JAPAN / DEMOCRATIC REPUBLIC OF KOREA / REPUBLIC OF
KOREA/WITHIN SOUTH ASIAN SUBCONTINENT OR WITHIN
SOUTHWEST PACIFIC
COMBINATIONS ARE WITH ANY CSM-/YSM- TYPE FARES
FOR CARRIER VN IN THIS RULE AND TARIFF.
ROUND TRIPS/CIRCLE TRIPS
FARES MAY BE COMBINED ON A HALF ROUND TRIP BASIS
WITH VN FARES
-TO FORM ROUND TRIPS
-TO FORM CIRCLE TRIPS WITH VN FARES
A MAXIMUM OF TWO INTERNATIONAL FARE COMPONENTS
PERMITTED.
PROVIDED -
COMBINATIONS ARE WITH ANY CSM-/YSM- TYPE FARES FOR
CARRIER VN IN THIS RULE AND TARIFF.

rules.title: SALES RESTRICTIONS
rules.text:
EXTENSION OF TICKET VALIDITY IS NOT PERMITTED.
TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON/AFTER 15APR17.

rules.title: HIP/MILEAGE EXCEPTIONS
rules.text: NO HIP OR MILEAGE EXCEPTIONS APPLY.

rules.title: TICKET ENDORSEMENTS
rules.text:
THE ORIGINAL AND THE REISSUED TICKET MUST BE ANNOTATED
- AWARD.NON-END/RTE/EXT. - AND - MILE DEDUCT IF CHG L
TO H - IN THE ENDORSEMENT BOX.

rules.title: CHILDREN DISCOUNTS
rules.text:
CNN/ACCOMPANIED CHILD PSGR 2-11 - CHARGE 75 PERCENT OF
THE FARE.
TICKET DESIGNATOR - CH25.
MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS.
OR - INF/INFANT WITHOUT A SEAT PSGR UNDER 2 - CHARGE 10
PERCENT OF THE FARE.
TICKET DESIGNATOR - IN90.
MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS.

rules.title: FARE BY RULE
rules.text:
VALID FOR ADULT PSGR.
THE FARE IS A SPECIFIED AMOUNT.
APPLY FARE BY RULE RULES TO THIS FARE FOR CATEGORIES:
50-RULE APPL        01-ELIGIBILITY      02-DAY/TIME
03-SEASONS          04-FLIGHT APPL      05-ADV RES/TKTG
06-MIN STAY         07-MAX STAY         08-STOPOVERS
09-TRANSFERS        10-COMBINATIONS     11-BLACKOUTS
12-SURCHARGES       13-ACCOMP TRAVEL    14-TRAVEL RESTR
15-SALES RESTR      16-PENALTIES        18-TICKET ENDO
19-CHILDREN DISC    20-TOUR COND DISC   21-AGENT DISC
22-ALL OTHER DISC   23-MISC PROVISIONS  26-GROUPS
27-TOURS            28-VISIT A COUNTRY  29-DEPOSITS
33-VOL RFDS         35-NEGOTIATED FARES

rules.title: VISIT ANOTHER COUNTRY
rules.text: NO VISIT ANOTHER COUNTRY PROVISIONS APPLY.

rules.title: VOLUNTARY REFUNDS
rules.text: CHECK CATEGORY 16 OR CONTACT CARRIER FOR DETAILS.

rules.title: NEGOTIATED FARES
rules.text:
TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON THE PLATE/STOCK OF VN.
FARES MAY BE VIEWED/PRICED/TICKETED BY CRS/CXR DEPT
JIV.
NO COMMISSION IS ALLOWED.

ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
VN FLIGHTS 1 THROUGH 3999

rules.title: BLACKOUT DATES
rules.text:
ORIGINATING SGN OUTBOUND -
TRAVEL IS NOT PERMITTED 03FEB18 THROUGH 19FEB18.
ORIGINATING HAN INBOUND -
TRAVEL IS NOT PERMITTED 03FEB18 THROUGH 19FEB18.
ORIGINATING HAN OUTBOUND -
TRAVEL IS NOT PERMITTED 16FEB18 THROUGH 26FEB18.
ORIGINATING SGN INBOUND -
TRAVEL IS NOT PERMITTED 16FEB18 THROUGH 26FEB18.

rules.title: TRAVEL RESTRICTIONS
rules.text:
VALID FOR TRAVEL COMMENCING ON/AFTER 24MAR18 AND ON/
BEFORE 30JUN18. ALL TRAVEL MUST BE COMPLETED BY 1159PM
ON 30JUN18.

rules.title: SALES RESTRICTIONS
rules.text:
FOOTNOTE RULE
TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON/AFTER 24MAR18 AND ON/BEFORE
30JUN18.
FARE RULE
TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON THE STOCK OF VN OR 1S AND
MAY NOT BE SOLD IN CSJ/HBN/HOO/KON/IQR/IQU/IRU/JNC/JND/
JNE/JNF/IQG/IZV/PZM/JNT/NKE. AND MAY ONLY BE SOLD IN
VIET NAM.

rules.title: PENALTIES
rules.text:
CANCELLATIONS
ANY TIME
TICKET IS NON-REFUNDABLE.
CHANGES
BEFORE DEPARTURE
CHARGE VND 600000.
CHILD/INFANT DISCOUNTS APPLY.
NOTE - TEXT BELOW NOT VALIDATED FOR AUTOPRICING.
- BEFORE DEPARTURE IS DEFINED AS BEFORE TICKETED
FLIGHT DATE.
AFTER DEPARTURE
CHANGES NOT PERMITTED.
NOTE - TEXT BELOW NOT VALIDATED FOR AUTOPRICING.
- AFTER DEPARTURE IS DEFINED AS ON/AFTER TICKETED
FLIGHT DATE

rules.title: HIP/MILEAGE EXCEPTIONS
rules.text:
THE HIGHER INTERMEDIATE POINT RULE DOES NOT APPLY FOR
STOPOVERS.
AND - THE HIGHER INTERMEDIATE POINT RULE DOES NOT APPLY
FOR CONNECTIONS.

rules.title: TICKET ENDORSEMENTS
rules.text:
THE ORIGINAL AND THE REISSUED TICKET MUST BE ANNOTATED
- NON-END.RESTRICT MAY APPLY - AND - CONTACT B4 DEPT
FOR CHANGE - IN THE ENDORSEMENT BOX.

rules.title: CHILDREN DISCOUNTS
rules.text:
FOR TICKETING ON/BEFORE 31MAR18
CNN/ACCOMPANIED CHILD PSGR 2-11 - CHARGE 75 PERCENT
OF THE FARE.
TICKET DESIGNATOR - CH25.
MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS IN THE SAME
COMPARTMENT BY ADULT PSGR 12 OR OLDER.
OR - 1ST INF/INFANT WITHOUT A SEAT PSGR UNDER 2 -
CHARGE 10 PERCENT OF THE FARE.
TICKET DESIGNATOR - IN90.
MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS IN THE SAME
COMPARTMENT BY ADULT PSGR 12 OR OLDER.
FOR TICKETING ON/AFTER 01APR18
CNN/ACCOMPANIED CHILD PSGR 2-11 - CHARGE 90 PERCENT
OF THE FARE.
TICKET DESIGNATOR - CH AND PERCENT APPLIED.
MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS IN THE SAME
COMPARTMENT BY ADULT PSGR 12 OR OLDER.
OR - 1ST INF/INFANT WITHOUT A SEAT PSGR UNDER 2 -
CHARGE 10 PERCENT OF THE FARE.
TICKET DESIGNATOR - IN AND PERCENT
APPLIED.
MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS IN THE SAME
COMPARTMENT BY ADULT PSGR 12 OR OLDER.

rules.title: RULE APPLICATION AND OTHER CONDITIONS
rules.text:
NOTE - THE FOLLOWING TEXT IS INFORMATIONAL AND NOT
VALIDATED FOR AUTOPRICING.
VIETNAM AIRLINES ECONOMY FARES
APPLICATION
AREA
THESE FARES APPLY WITHIN VIET NAM.
CLASS OF SERVICE
THESE FARES APPLY FOR ECONOMY CLASS SERVICE.
TYPES OF TRANSPORTATION
THIS RULE GOVERNS ONE-WAY AND ROUND-TRIP FARES.
FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE CAN BE USED TO CREATE
ONE-WAY/ROUND-TRIP/CIRCLE-TRIP/OPEN-JAW JOURNEYS.
CAPACITY LIMITATIONS
THE CARRIER SHALL LIMIT THE NUMBER OF PASSENGERS
CARRIED ON ANY ONE FLIGHT AT FARES GOVERNED BY
THIS RULE AND SUCH FARES WILL NOT NECESSARILY BE
AVAILABLE ON ALL FLIGHTS. THE NUMBER OF SEATS,
WHICH THE CARRIER SHALL MAKE AVAILABLE ON A GIVEN
FLIGHT, WILL BE DETERMINED BY THE CARRIER$S BEST
JUDGEMENT.

rules.title: FLIGHT APPLICATION
rules.text:
THE FARE COMPONENT MUST NOT BE ON
ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
VN FLIGHTS 4000 THROUGH 4999.
AND
THE FARE COMPONENT MUST BE ON
ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
ANY VN FLIGHT.

rules.title: ADVANCE RESERVATIONS/TICKETING
rules.text:
NOTE - TEXT BELOW NOT VALIDATED FOR AUTOPRICING.
GO-SHOW - CONTACT VN OFFICE FOR DETAILS.

rules.title: STOPOVERS
rules.text: STOPOVERS ARE NOT PERMITTED AT INTERMEDIATE POINTS.

rules.title: TRANSFERS
rules.text:
NO TRANSFERS PERMITTED.
FARE BREAK AND EMBEDDED SURFACE SECTORS NOT PERMITTED
ON THE FARE COMPONENT.

rules.title: COMBINATIONS
rules.text:
SINGLE/DOUBLE OPEN JAWS NOT PERMITTED.
END-ON-END
END-ON-END COMBINATIONS PERMITTED. VALIDATE ALL FARE
COMBINATIONS.
PROVIDED -
COMBINATIONS ARE WITH ANY -VNF TYPE FARES FOR
CARRIER VN IN IN THIS RULE AND TARIFF
OR RULE VND4 IN TARIFF
FBRA3P  - WITHIN AREA 3.
IF THE FARE COMPONENT IS ON
ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
VN FLIGHTS 1 THROUGH 3999
VN FLIGHTS 5000 THROUGH 9999.
ROUND TRIPS/CIRCLE TRIPS
FARES MAY BE COMBINED ON A HALF ROUND TRIP BASIS
WITH VN FARES
-TO FORM ROUND TRIPS
-TO FORM CIRCLE TRIPS WITH VN FARES.
PROVIDED -
COMBINATIONS ARE WITH ANY -VNF TYPE FARES FOR
CARRIER VN IN IN THIS RULE AND TARIFF
OR RULE VND4 IN TARIFF
FBRA3P  - WITHIN AREA 3.
IF THE FARE COMPONENT IS ON
ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
VN FLIGHTS 1 THROUGH 3999
VN FLIGHTS 5000 THROUGH 9999.

rules.text:
ORIGINATING SGN OUTBOUND -
TRAVEL IS NOT PERMITTED 03FEB18 THROUGH 19FEB18.
ORIGINATING HAN INBOUND -
TRAVEL IS NOT PERMITTED 03FEB18 THROUGH 19FEB18.
ORIGINATING HAN OUTBOUND -
TRAVEL IS NOT PERMITTED 16FEB18 THROUGH 26FEB18.
ORIGINATING SGN INBOUND -
TRAVEL IS NOT PERMITTED 16FEB18 THROUGH 26FEB18.

rules.title: SALES RESTRICTIONS
rules.text:
FOOTNOTE RULE
TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON/BEFORE 31MAR18.
FARE RULE
TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON THE STOCK OF VN OR 1S AND
MAY NOT BE SOLD IN CSJ/HBN/HOO/KON/IQR/IQU/IRU/JNC/JND/
JNE/JNF/IQG/IZV/PZM/JNT/NKE. AND MAY ONLY BE SOLD IN
VIET NAM.

rules.title: PENALTIES
rules.text:
CANCELLATIONS
ANY TIME
CHARGE VND 300000.
CHILD/INFANT DISCOUNTS APPLY.
CHANGES
ANY TIME
CHANGES PERMITTED.

rules.title: HIP/MILEAGE EXCEPTIONS
rules.text:
THE HIGHER INTERMEDIATE POINT RULE DOES NOT APPLY FOR
STOPOVERS.
AND - THE HIGHER INTERMEDIATE POINT RULE DOES NOT APPLY
FOR CONNECTIONS.

rules.title: TICKET ENDORSEMENTS
rules.text:
THE ORIGINAL AND THE REISSUED TICKET MUST BE ANNOTATED
- NON-END.RESTRICT MAY APPLY - AND - CONTACT B4 DEPT
FOR CHANGE - IN THE ENDORSEMENT BOX.

rules.title: CHILDREN DISCOUNTS
rules.text:
FOR TICKETING ON/BEFORE 31MAR18
CNN/ACCOMPANIED CHILD PSGR 2-11 - CHARGE 75 PERCENT
OF THE FARE.
TICKET DESIGNATOR - CH25.
MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS IN THE SAME
COMPARTMENT BY ADULT PSGR 12 OR OLDER.
OR - 1ST INF/INFANT WITHOUT A SEAT PSGR UNDER 2 -
CHARGE 10 PERCENT OF THE FARE.
TICKET DESIGNATOR - IN90.
MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS IN THE SAME
COMPARTMENT BY ADULT PSGR 12 OR OLDER.
FOR TICKETING ON/AFTER 01APR18
CNN/ACCOMPANIED CHILD PSGR 2-11 - CHARGE 90 PERCENT
OF THE FARE.
TICKET DESIGNATOR - CH AND PERCENT APPLIED.
MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS IN THE SAME
COMPARTMENT BY ADULT PSGR 12 OR OLDER.
OR - 1ST INF/INFANT WITHOUT A SEAT PSGR UNDER 2 -
CHARGE 10 PERCENT OF THE FARE.
TICKET DESIGNATOR - IN AND PERCENT
APPLIED.
MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS IN THE SAME
COMPARTMENT BY ADULT PSGR 12 OR OLDER.
